channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats advance 5 more Biden judicial nominees

item.title: Who will Trump pick next for attorney general after Gaetz's withdrawal?
item.description: Now that former Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz is out of the running to head the Justice Department, whom will Trump name to head the agency? Here are potent...

item.title: Ted Cruz urges White House to halt $1.25B in 'digital equity' funds
item.description: Texas Sen. Ted Cruz urges the Biden-Harris administration to halt a $1.25 billion broadband program, calling its race-based criteria unconstitutional.

item.title: Crow on the Menu: Bucks County, PA Election Official Meekly Walks Back Controversial Comments
Fetterman says 'F--- that' amid bipartisan backlash over arrest warrants targeting Israel's Netanyahu, Gallant
item.description: U.S. lawmakers from both parties condemned the ICC's move to issue arrest warrants against Israeli figures Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Gallant.

item.title: Matt Gaetz Withdrawal: Why It Happened, and What Comes Next
Lee Greenwood to Newsmax: Trump Shows He's Man of God
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has proven to be a man of God and faith, Lee Greenwood, the artist behind "God Bless the USA," told Newsmax.

item.title: House Oversight to Form Subcommittee for DOGE
item.description: The House Oversight Committee announced Thursday it is creating a subcommittee for the newly formed Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).
